mod.name: Infinite Spire
mod.credits: Contributors: The_Evil_Pickle, RedDyeNo5, Gremious, Len (for French translation)
mod.description:
Adds a new way to climb the spire forever, complete quests along the way, but be careful, the spire will not be kind to those who do not give up.

Also thanks to kiooeht, test477, The_Evil_Pickle, Moocowsgomoo, fiiiiilth, NellyDevo, Chronometrics, MichaelMayhem and Reina for helping me learn more about programming. 

 Shoutouts to Fairy, gkjzhgffjh, Nafen, Jedi and JohnnyBazooka for being awesome members of the modding community.

relics.name: Dark Rift
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a random Black card to your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: It looks like a small galaxy!

relics.name: Beetle Shell
relics.description: Every 10th time you gain Block from a card, gain double the Block.

relics.name: Freezer
relics.description: At the start of combat, channel 1 Frost orb.

relics.name: Lucky Rock
relics.description: Each time you play an attack card, you have a 5% chance to gain Critical.

relics.name: Puzzle Cube
relics.description: At the start of each turn, Puzzle Cube picks a random card in your draw pile, if you play that card, draw a card.

relics.name: Satchel
relics.description: At the end of each turn Retain 1 card.

relics.name: Bottled Mercury
relics.description: Upon pickup choose a card, when it is played, if it is an Attack, gain 1 Strength, if it is a Skill, gain 1 Dexterity, if it is a Power, gain 2 Focus.

relics.name: Bottled Soul
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose an Exhaust card. Whenever you play that card, it no longer Exhausts.
relics.flavorText: A broken bottle... A broken soul...

relics.name: Broken Mirror
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 3 Reflection.

relics.name: Checkered Pen
relics.description: Whenever you play a card, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

relics.name: Empowering Shard
relics.description: For each act you climb gain 1 Strength at the start of combat.
relics.flavorText: It feels like it holds great power...

relics.name: Eraser
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate.
Usable only once per combat.
Restart an elite combat against a different elite. The enemies will be stronger.
Can be used 3 times.

relics.name: Focusing Shard
relics.description: For each act you climb Upgrade a random card at the start of combat.

relics.name: Midas Blood
relics.description: Whenever you take HP damage, gain 2 gold.
relics.flavorText: Taking damage never felt so good.

relics.name: Shielding Shard
relics.description: For each act you climb gain 3 Temp HP at the start of combat.

relics.name: Soldering Iron
relics.description: Every 3 orbs you channel in one turn, gain 1 Orb slot

relics.name: Warding Shard
relics.description: For each act you climb gain 1 Dexterity at the start of combat.

relics.name: Cursed Dice
relics.description:
Can only be used once.
When you would die, shuffle your hand and discard pile into your draw pile, you no longer take damage. If you win before you empty your draw pile and hand, heal 35% max hp. Otherwise you die!
relics.flavorText: Onward unto death! Die like a nail hammered into a coffin!

relics.name: Golem's Mask
relics.description: On the first turn of combat, gain Golem's Might.
relics.flavorText: Just like the golem, slow and steady.

relics.name: Joker Card
relics.description: Every 15th card you play is played twice.
relics.flavorText: Takes the form of any other card.

relics.name: Lychee Nut
relics.description: Upon pick up, lose 25% of your max HP. At the start of combat gain 3 Regen.

relics.name: Magic Flask
relics.description:
At campfires, the rest option may now be taken for free. This consumes 1 use.
Starts with 3 uses. Kill bosses to gain 2 more uses.

Synergy: Bottled Heart

relics.name: Abe's Evil Pickle
relics.description: After combat, gain 6.5% interest on your gold.
relics.flavorText: Nothing is more evil than gold!

relics.name: Black Egg
relics.description:
Right click to toggle.
When activated the next floor's boss will be The Lord of Annihilation.

relics.name: Blank's Blanky
relics.description: When resting at Rest Sites, heal to full.

relics.name: Cubic Diamond
relics.description: Upon pick up, replace your starter relic with a random starter relic.

relics.name: Mutagenic Dexterity
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 Dexterity that is lost at the end of your turn.
relics.flavorText: The subject is able to endure more damage, only for a short while.

relics.name: Burning Sword
relics.description: At the start of each turn, gain Critical. The first Attack you play adds a Burn to your hand.

relics.name: Cupcake
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. After 3 turns, become De-Energized.

relics.name: Chaos
relics.description: Upon pickup, replace every relic you hold with a random relic.

potions.name: Black Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Black cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

keywords.name: Critical
keywords.description: The next attack you play will deal 2x damage.

keywords.name: De-energized
keywords.description: At the start of each turn, lose 1 energy.

keywords.name: Golem's might
keywords.description: Each turn your attacks deal 5% more damage than the last turn.

keywords.name: Mitigation
keywords.description: Reduces all damage by a percentage.

keywords.name: Shredded
keywords.description: For each card played for the rest of combat, the enemy takes 10% more damage from Attacks.
